fullText: Despite some flaws in the book and a few pacing issues, Harmony succeeds as a moving testament to the power of music and friendship in the face of unimaginable evil.
dtliExcerpt: Despite some flaws in the book and a few pacing issues, Harmony succeeds as a moving testament to the power of music and friendship in the face of unimaginable evil.
